entry.value: INSERT INTO dwh.pipelines_logs (stop_dt, last_layer, status) VALUES(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'dwh', 'Failed');
select customer_id, product_id, qty, invoice_dt from sales where invoice_dt > (select watermark_value from watermarktable where table_name = 'sales')
INSERT INTO dwh.pipelines_logs (stop_dt, last_layer, status) VALUES(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'mrr/sales', 'Failed');
update watermarktable set watermark_value = (select max(invoice_dt) from sales) where table_name = 'sales'
INSERT INTO dwh.pipelines_logs (stop_dt, last_layer, status) VALUES(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'mrr/products', 'Failed');
select id, name, groupname from products
INSERT INTO dwh.pipelines_logs (stop_dt, last_layer, status) VALUES(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'mrr/customers', 'Failed');
select id, name, country from customers
INSERT INTO dwh.pipelines_logs (stop_dt, last_layer, status) VALUES(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'stg/products', 'Failed');
select id, name, groupname from mrr.mrr_dim_products
INSERT INTO dwh.pipelines_logs (stop_dt, last_layer, status) VALUES(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'stg/customers', 'Failed');
select id, name, country from mrr.mrr_dim_customers
select customer_id, product_id, qty, invoice_dt from mrr.mrr_fct_sales where invoice_dt > (select watermark_value from mrr.watermarktable where table_name = 'sales')
update mrr.watermarktable set watermark_value = (select max(invoice_dt) from mrr.mrr_fct_sales) where table_name = 'sales'
INSERT INTO dwh.pipelines_logs (stop_dt, last_layer, status) VALUES(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'stg/sales', 'Failed');
